titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building to be constructed in Lakeland, Florida, as the "Lawton Chiles, Jr., Federal Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Designates the Federal building to be constructed in Lakeland, Florida, which will replace the existing Federal building, as the Lawton Chiles, Jr., Federal Building.
